Miscellaneous Highlights: The match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka will be played at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad.
The venue has already hosted two matches so far in the competition.
Kusal Mendis' burst of eight sixes in the Powerplay was the only bright spot for Sri Lanka.
Pakistan won their first match, beating Netherlands by 81 runs after posting a competitive 286 thanks to fifties from Mohammad Rizwan (68) and Saud Shakeel (68)
Others: Pakistan vs Sri Lanka match in ODI Cricket World Cup 2023: TV channel, telecast and live stream details
The ICC World Cup 2023 game between Pakistan and Sri Lanka will be played on Tuesday, October 10, 2023.
